author: Justin Vallejo, Justin Vallejo
title: Coronavirus: Governor of state with largest Covid-19 cluster defends lack of stay-at-home order
description: More than half state's cases connected to Sioux Falls meat processing plant
content:
The governor of South Dakota has defended the states lack of a stay-at-home order, despite experiencing the countrys single largest cluster of coronavirus cases.
More than half the states 1168 confirmed cases were connected to the Smithfield Foods pork proce… [+2705 chars]
